pageContext.claim: “Much of that had to do with Fulton County, which hasn’t been checked. We think that if you check the signatures — a real check of the signatures going back in Fulton County — you'll find at least a couple of hundred thousand of forged signatures of people who have been forged.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is making up numbers here. There were only about 147,000 absentee ballots cast in Fulton County, making it impossible to have “a couple of hundred thousand” forged signatures.
